#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
long long t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{	
long long n,k,count=0;
cin>>k>>n;	
bool prime[n+1];
memset(prime,true,sizeof(prime));
for(long long p=2;p*p<=n;p++)
{
	if(prime[p]==true)
	for(long long i=p*2;i<=n;i+=p)
	{
		prime[i]=false;
	}
	

}	
for(long long i=k;i<=n;i++)
if(prime[i])
count++;
cout<<count<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
